attributes.action: If the PM's deal is rejected, Leave the EU with NO DEAL on the 12th April 2019
attributes.additional_details:
In 2016 17.4 million people ticked the 'Leave the European Union' box on the referendum ballot paper. They did not tick a box asking for government to make a withdrawal agreement.

The PM herself said "Leave means leave!" and "No deal is better than a bad deal".

The UK has spoken. We want no deal!
attributes.background:
In 2016 17.4 million people ticked the 'Leave the European Union' box on the referendum ballot paper. They did not tick a box asking for government to make a withdrawal agreement.

We are not leaving Europe, we will simply not be bound by their rules anymore.
